stimulusHtml: Which of the following best represents the minimum coefficient of static friction required for the race car to continue to follow the circular path shown?

features.html: On a level horizontal table, a toy race car of mass M moves with constant speed v around a flat circular racetrack of radius R.

choicesHtml: Rg v 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3A28@

M v 2 R MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3A18@

v 2 g MathType@MTEF@5@5@@395B@

v 2 Rg MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3A32@

v 2 2Rg MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3AEE@
